name: NeelSmith.github.io
body:
## Developing Citable Archives of Scholarly Material##

- With Chris Blackwell, I work on the CITE architecture ([here on github](http://cite-architecture.github.io/))
- Archives I'm helping develop:
    - the [HomerMultitext project's](http://homermultitext.github.io/) github repositories
    - repositories of the [Phoros project](http://phoros.github.io) (sources for the study of Athenian tribute)
- Here I am [at Holy Cross][hc].

## The Holy Cross MID Club##
All the scholarly editing projects I collaborate on with members of the [Holy Cross Manuscripts, Inscriptions and Documents Club][mid] (HCMID) are currently using github for their archival repositories.  

- Here are [Holy Cross MID's](http://hcmid.github.io/) github repositories


[ov]: http://shot.holycross.edu/~nsmith/gits.html

[midgit]: http://neelsmith.github.io/hcmid-edd/

[mid]:  http://shot.holycross.edu/hcmid/

[hc]:  http://shot.holycross.edu/~nsmith
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
